item.description:
After a long hiatus, it's time for the occasional meetups at Don's place to resume!

I'm excited to host again! Tonight we're going to play a game that's been a favorite of mine for a long time, and that I bet most of you have never played: Acquire.

Acquire is an American game from the 1960s, but it's remarkably like a Euro. I think you're gonna love it if you give it a chance. Here's a link to its entry on Boardgamegeek.com if you wanna read about it: http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/5/acquire

Up to 6 can play, so I'm limiting RSVPs to that number. Each member can invite no more than 1 guest. I'll provide a few snacks (please don't expect anything even remotely similar to Margaret's!). Please BYOB, a snack to share, if you wish, and $1 for our wonderful organizer Nina. If you already know how to play Acquire, feel free to come at 6:30. Otherwise, please plan to show up on time (at 6:00) so I can go over the rules just once. :)

I can't wait to see (some of!) you at my new place soon!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Acquire at Don's New Place
